alert.note: Alert for Fayette; Marion (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued February 22 at 3:30PM CST until February 22 at 3:45PM CST by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 345 PM CST FOR NORTHWESTERN MARION AND SOUTHEASTERN FAYETTE COUNTIES... At 329 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Wrights Corner to near St. Elmo to near Farina, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Salem, Odin, Kinmundy, Farina, Omega, Stephen Forbes Station, Tonti, La Clede, St. Peter, Alma, Loogootee, St. James, St. Paul, Selmaville and Brubaker. This includes Interstate 57 in Illinois between exits 116 and 135. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 PM CST for south central Illinois. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
